RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 5F Dirt CR: 69. Maiden Claiming Purse 7700. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RED GUN a step slow through the turn lost ground to upper stretch firing late past mid track getting up in the final yards. KLIMT RIDE stalked the pace rallying to engage between horses on the turn taking a late lead ceding to wide pressure. MY SONG BABY sharp to clear was hooked along the inside on the turn gradually wearing down through the lane. ELEGGUA slow early saved ground to upper stretch finishing evenly. KEYSER was never involved. ELUSIVE QUESTION pressed three deep on the turn then tired the final eighth. SECRET CAMELOT trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Eleggua
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, saved ground, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: My Song Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace, hooked inside turn, wore down lane

ENTRY.NAME: Klimt Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, engaged between turn, led late, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Keyser
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Red Gun
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, lost ground to lane, fired late past mid track in time

ENTRY.NAME: Secret Camelot
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Elusive Question
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed three deep turn, tired lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE SEPTEMBER 24, 2022. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 24 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UNTOUCHED ELEGANCE away alertly set the pace holding a clear lead through the turn digging in with outside position down the lane warding off inside pressure. SHOW ME THE BEST hustled on the inside vied into upper stretch responding willingly late being held at bay. SUSIKIN chased the pace through the turn vying between horses in upper stretch weakening late. ILLUSIONS OF LOVE raced evenly moving four wide down the lane lacking surge there. UNDETECTED slow early raced mid track down the lane finishing evenly. MAVI lunged missing the break. LADY VALENTINA chased through the turn tiring in upper stretch. ORBETTE flashed early speed then faded on the turn. SECRET AFFIRMATION was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Show Me the Best
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled inside, vied top lane, willingly, held at bay

ENTRY.NAME: Susikin
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, between horses top lane, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Mavi
ENTRY.COMMENT: lunged at the break

ENTRY.NAME: Orbette
ENTRY.COMMENT: flashed speed, faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Valentina
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased through the turn, tired,

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Illusions of Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, 4 wide lane, lacked surge

ENTRY.NAME: Secret Affirmation
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Untouched Elegance
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, dug in outside of foes, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Undetected
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, 5 wide into lane, finished evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE SEPTEMBER 24, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DESIGNATE stalked the pace drawing even abreast rival at the quarter pole clearing in upper stretch drawing off as much the best. BEE WINGS raced evenly through the far turn moving four deep in upper stretch clearing late as second best. CHECK SIX stalked the pace chasing on the far turn weakening in upper stretch holding off the others. ESTA CALIENTE in close after the break lagged to upper stretch having a modest gain there. SECRET ARCHANGEL sent clear set the pace through the backside being hooked on the far turn ceding in upper stretch tiring the final eighth. YESTERDAYSPLAN played no factor. MOTHERWELL raced evenly for a half then wilted into upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Bee Wings
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, 4 wide into lane, up for place

ENTRY.NAME: Esta Caliente
ENTRY.COMMENT: in close after break, lagged to lane, modest gain inside

ENTRY.NAME: Secret Archangel
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, hooked far turn, tired,

ENTRY.NAME: Check Six
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, chased far turn, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Yesterdaysplan
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Designate
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, drew even 1/4 pole, cleared top lane, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Motherwell
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, spent lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 8100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 24 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHOPPED went evenly gaining on the far turn circling out to bid four wide in upper stretch surging clear late. DEJOHN set a pressured pace dueling on the far turn into upper stretch ceding to outside pressure while holding well to salvage place. KAZTHAROS tracked the pace pressing in bid on the far turn extending inside in upper stretch finishing evenly. TODAY MATTERS slow early lagged to upper stretch moving up there four wide. STRASBOURG raced mid pack lacking a rally. AGADOR SPARTACUS gave a middle move pressing on the far turn fading in upper stretch. TURBINADO hustled five wide on the far turn would fade in upper stretch. TALK TO TOKEY prompted the pace pressing on the far turn wilting in upper stretch. BASSETT was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Dejohn
ENTRY.COMMENT: set a pressured pace, dueled to lane, no match, held for place

ENTRY.NAME: Chopped
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, gained turn, circled out lane, surged clear four path

ENTRY.NAME: Talk to Tokey
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, spent lane

ENTRY.NAME: Kaztharos
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, pressed far turn, finished evenly inside

ENTRY.NAME: Agador Spartacus
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, pressed far turn, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Strasbourg
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Turbinado
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled 5wi turn, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Today Matters
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged to lane, moved up late 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Bassett
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 8100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 24 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAMBO KITTEN stalked the pace rallying to put a head in front on the far turn shaking clear in upper stretch angling out while adding on late. QUEEN OF CLASS advanced on the backside dueling for the lead on the far turn ceding to rival in upper stretch staying after it late to save place. CHORIST gained to the far turn chasing from the inside to upper stretch vying evenly from the rail there. CROSSTOWN GIRL sent clear set the early pace then faded on the far turn. O K BABY raced evenly tiring in upper stretch. NATIVE VALLEY played no factor. EGG NOG tracked the early pace fading on the far turn. HERE COMES LOVIE folded up on the far turn. PER RULING FROM THE WEST VIRGINIA RACING COMMISSION, MAMBO KITTEN WAS DISQUALIFIED FOR POSITIVE TEST.

ENTRY.NAME: Crosstown Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, faded far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Native Valley
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Queen of Class
ENTRY.OWNER: Tijuana Racing Stables Tenenbaum Jeffrey and Bloom Jeffrey
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, pressed far turn, ceded lane, held place

ENTRY.NAME: Chorist
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, chased inside to lane, vied evenly at rail

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Mambo Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, drew even far turn, clear lane, angled out

ENTRY.NAME: Egg Nog
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, faded far turn

ENTRY.NAME: O K Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, tired lane

ENTRY.NAME: Here Comes Lovie
ENTRY.COMMENT: folded up on far turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 74. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 24 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)( W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GIO MARIA set the pace dueling inside of rival to the quarter pole shaking off foe to clear in upper stretch being ridden out. MISS SHADY raced evenly moving four wide down the lane responding late to save place. IN TO THE NIGHT slow early rallied three deep in mid stretch drifting in a bit pressing to the wire. DON'T LOOK UP slow early rallied in mid stretch being put in tight between horses late. IRISH VICTORY pressed the pace dueling abreast rival on the turn ceding in upper stretch weakening late. AMERICA'S DREAM chased through the turn then faded in upper stretch. ONE MORE NIGHT raced evenly in mid pack tiring in upper stretch. MARPIN was always outrun. AN OBJECTION FROM THE RIDER OF DON'T LOOK UP AGAINST THE RIDER OF IN TO THE NIGHT FOR INTERFERENCE DURING THE STRETCH RUN WAS DISMISSED BY THE STEWARDS.

ENTRY.NAME: America's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased through the turn, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Gio Maria
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, dueled far turn, shook clear lane, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: In to the Night
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, rallied kid stretch, three deep, drifted in

ENTRY.NAME: Don't Look Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, vied top lane, in tight between horses late

ENTRY.NAME: One More Night
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, tired lane

ENTRY.NAME: Irish Victory
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, ceded top lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Shady
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, 4 wide lane, rallied late for place

ENTRY.NAME: Marpin
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 85. Starter Allowance Purse 14200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $4,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 24 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In E stimating Allowances) (Preference to Highest Earnings in 2022-2023).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOLD ADVENTURE slow early circled out to upper stretch surging up late six wide. BROTHER SKYE slow early saved ground to upper stretch rallying late along the inside. SILENT TIGER stalked the pace chasing to upper stretch extending in bid hanging late. JOSHY JAK sent clear set the pace through the turn digging in with a solid lead in upper stretch faltering late. LE GENERAL pressed up on the turn then faded in upper stretch. HONOR LIFE was never involved.

ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, circled out to lane, surged up 6 wide

ENTRY.NAME: Brother Skye
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, saved ground to lane, rallied late inside

ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, dug in lane, faltered,

ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, chased to lane, extended late, hung,

ENTRY.NAME: Honor Life
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Le General
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed up on the turn, faded lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 9400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 24 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TESTED POSITIVE slow early rallied to upper stretch surging clear in the final yards. ANNA VOLANTE pressed the pace wresting the lead in upper stretch digging in late being run down in the final yards. TEAM HOT LINE moved evenly losing ground to upper stretch vying late six wide. POLITICAL ASTRAY slow early lost ground to upper stretch gaining a bit late seven wide. HIALEAH HOTTIE pressured through the turn tiring in upper stretch. PASSINGTHEMISTERY pressed a narrow lead dueling to upper stretch wearing out ;late. TORIANNE was always outrun. RAHTID raced evenly giving way in upper stretch.
